roles: Cutting-edge JavaScript (ECMAScript 5 and ES2015);  Two years experience building enterprise web applications and marketing sites with AngularJS 1.x, ReactJS, and related front-end technologies

Promoted to front-end leadership after first performance review.  Regularly invited to participate in groups that helped guide the company's evolution with agile/scrum, UX, and development

Through our team's efforts, the company reported a 40% profit growth, best in company history

Developed philosophies on leadership and social behavior during pursuit of graduate level degree in Education, while concurrently teaching/tutoring high school students at a Chicago Public School
Built and maintained custom Visual Basic plug-ins in a multinational corporate environment
Received formal SQL training; Two-years developing PL/SQL programs to process real-time NFL game day data, while simultaneously converting legacy NFL data to Oracle 9i
Worked another two years in STATS' fantasy sports department, developing web applications and user interfaces with XHTML, ASP, and ODBC
